    • Typography

JDRF Design System

Components

Buttons

These are notes associated with the button components.

Primary

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Primary</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary hover">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" disabled>Disabled</button>

Secondary

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline">Secondary</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline hover">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline" disabled>Disabled</button>

Flat

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary">Flat</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary hover">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" disabled>Disabled</button>

Text

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-link">Text</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-link hover">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-link" disabled>Disabled</button>

Large

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-lg">Large</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-lg hover">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-lg" disabled>Disabled</button>

Small

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-sm">Small</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-sm hover">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-sm" disabled>Disabled</button>

Block

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block">Block</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block hover">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block" disabled>Disabled</button>

Button Animations

Coming soon.... 
<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Primary</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Primary</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary hover">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" disabled>Disabled</button>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary"&gt;Primary&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary hover"&gt;Hover&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" disabled&gt;Disabled&lt;/button&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Secondary</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline">Secondary</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline hover">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline" disabled>Disabled</button>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
		<code class="language-markup">&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline"&gt;Secondary&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline hover"&gt;Hover&lt;/button&gt;
		&lt;button type="button" class="btn btn-primary-outline" disabled&gt;Disabled&lt;/button&gt;</code>
	</pre>
</section>

	<h4 class="f-example-title">Flat</h4>

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary hover">Hover</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" disabled>Disabled</button>
	</div>

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-link" disabled>Disabled</button>
	</div>

	</pre>

		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg hover">Hover</button>

	</pre>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Block</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block">Block</button>
		<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block hover">Hover</button>

	</div>

Forms

These are notes associated with the form component.

For more information on Bootstrap's classes for form layouts, validation and so on, refer to Bootstrap's form documentation.

Email Field

We'll never share your email with anyone else.

Address Field

Password Field

Select Box

Multiple Select Box

Text Field

Textarea

Radio Options

Checkbox

Inline Forms: Visible Labels

Inline Forms: Hidden Labels

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Email Field</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputEmail1">Email address</label>
				<input type="email" class="form-control" id="exampleInputEmail1" placeholder="Enter email">
				<small class="text-muted">We'll never share your email with anyone else.</small>
			</fieldset>
		</form>
	</div>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Address Field</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputAddress1">Address</label>
				<input type="address" class="form-control" id="exampleInputAddress1" placeholder="Enter Address">
			</fieldset>
		</form>
	</div>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Password Field</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputPassword1">Password</label>
				<input type="password" class="form-control" id="exampleInputPassword1" placeholder="Password">
			</fieldset>
		</form>
	</div>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Select Box</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleSelect1">Example select</label>
				<select class="form-control" id="exampleSelect1">
				  <option>1</option>
				  <option>2</option>
				  <option>3</option>
				  <option>4</option>
				  <option>5</option>
				</select>
			</fieldset>
		</form>
	</div>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Multiple Select Box</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleSelect2">Example multiple select</label>
				<select multiple class="form-control" id="exampleSelect2">
				  <option>1</option>
				  <option>2</option>
				  <option>3</option>
				  <option>4</option>
				  <option>5</option>
				</select>
			</fieldset>
		</form>
	</div>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Text Field</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputText1">Example Text Field</label>
				<input type="text" class="form-control" id="exampleInputText1" placeholder="Type something">
			</fieldset>
		</form>
	</div>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Textarea</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<form>
			<fieldset class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleTextarea">Example Textarea</label>
				<textarea class="form-control" id="exampleTextarea" rows="3"></textarea>
			</fieldset>
		</form>
	</div>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Radio Options</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<form>
			<div class="radio">
				<label>
				  <input type="radio" name="optionsRadios" id="optionsRadios1" value="option1" checked>
				  Option one is this and that&mdash;be sure to include why it's great
				</label>
			</div>
			<div class="radio">
				<label>
				  <input type="radio" name="optionsRadios" id="optionsRadios2" value="option2">
				  Option two can be something else and selecting it will deselect option one
				</label>
			</div>
			<div class="radio disabled">
				<label>
				  <input type="radio" name="optionsRadios" id="optionsRadios3" value="option3" disabled>
				  Option three is disabled
				</label>
			</div>
		</form>
	</div>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Checkbox</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<form>
			<div class="checkbox">
				<label>
				  <input type="checkbox"> Check me out
				</label>
			</div>
		</form>
	</div>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Inline Forms: Visible Labels</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<form class="form-inline">
			<div class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputName2">Name</label>
				<input type="text" class="form-control" id="exampleInputName2" placeholder="Jane Doe">
			</div>
			<div class="form-group">
				<label for="exampleInputEmail2">Email</label>
				<input type="email" class="form-control" id="exampleInputEmail2" placeholder="jane.doe@example.com">
			</div>
			<button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Send invitation</button>
		</form>
	</div>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Inline Forms: Hidden Labels</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<form class="form-inline">
			<div class="form-group">
				<label class="sr-only" for="exampleInputEmail3">Email address</label>
				<input type="email" class="form-control" id="exampleInputEmail3" placeholder="Enter email">
			</div>
			<div class="form-group">
				<label class="sr-only" for="exampleInputPassword3">Password</label>
				<input type="password" class="form-control" id="exampleInputPassword3" placeholder="Password">
			</div>
			<div class="checkbox">
				<label>
		      <input type="checkbox"> Remember me
		    </label>
			</div>
			<button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Sign in</button>
		</form>
	</div>
</section>

Side Navigation

The nav class is a Bootstrap default whereas we're adding a custom class sidebar to further customize for Design System.

Sidebar: Single Level

  • Current Parent
  • Parent Link
  • Parent Link
  • Parent Link 
    <ul class="nav sidebar">
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a class="nav-link current" href="#!">Current Parent</a>
      </li>
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
      </li>
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
      </li>
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
      </li>
    </ul>

Sidebar: Two Levels

  • Parent Link
  • Parent Link
    • Child Link
    • Child Link
    • Child Link
  • Parent Link 
    <ul class="nav sidebar">
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
      </li>
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
        <ul class="nav">
          <li class="nav-item">
            <a class="nav-link current" href="#!">Current Child</a>
          </li>
          <li class="nav-item">
            <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Child Link</a>
          </li>
          <li class="nav-item">
            <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Child Link</a>
          </li>
        </ul>
      </li>
      <li class="nav-item">
        <a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
      </li>
    </ul>
  
<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Sidebar: Single Level</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<ul class="nav sidebar">
			<li class="nav-item">
				<a class="nav-link current" href="#!">Current Parent</a>
			</li>
			<li class="nav-item">
				<a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
			</li>
			<li class="nav-item">
				<a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
			</li>
			<li class="nav-item">
				<a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
			</li>
		</ul>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
    <code class="language-markup">&lt;ul class="nav sidebar"&gt;
      &lt;li class="nav-item"&gt;
        &lt;a class="nav-link current" href="#!"&gt;Current Parent&lt;/a&gt;
      &lt;/li&gt;
      &lt;li class="nav-item"&gt;
        &lt;a class="nav-link" href="#!"&gt;Parent Link&lt;/a&gt;
      &lt;/li&gt;
      &lt;li class="nav-item"&gt;
        &lt;a class="nav-link" href="#!"&gt;Parent Link&lt;/a&gt;
      &lt;/li&gt;
      &lt;li class="nav-item"&gt;
        &lt;a class="nav-link" href="#!"&gt;Parent Link&lt;/a&gt;
      &lt;/li&gt;
    &lt;/ul&gt;</code>
  </pre>
</section>

<section class="f-section">
	<h4 class="f-example-title">Sidebar: Two Levels</h4>
	<div class="f-example">
		<ul class="nav sidebar">
			<li class="nav-item">
				<a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
			</li>
			<li class="nav-item">
				<a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
				<ul class="nav">
					<li class="nav-item">
						<a class="nav-link current" href="#!">Child Link</a>
					</li>
					<li class="nav-item">
						<a class="nav-link" href="#!">Child Link</a>
					</li>
					<li class="nav-item">
						<a class="nav-link" href="#!">Child Link</a>
					</li>
				</ul>
			</li>
			<li class="nav-item">
				<a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link</a>
			</li>
		</ul>
	</div>
	<pre class="language-markup">
    <code class="language-markup">&lt;ul class="nav sidebar"&gt;
      &lt;li class="nav-item"&gt;
        &lt;a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link&lt;/a&gt;
      &lt;/li&gt;
      &lt;li class="nav-item"&gt;
        &lt;a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link&lt;/a&gt;
        &lt;ul class="nav"&gt;
          &lt;li class="nav-item"&gt;
            &lt;a class="nav-link current" href="#!">Current Child&lt;/a&gt;
          &lt;/li&gt;
          &lt;li class="nav-item"&gt;
            &lt;a class="nav-link" href="#!">Child Link&lt;/a&gt;
          &lt;/li&gt;
          &lt;li class="nav-item"&gt;
            &lt;a class="nav-link" href="#!">Child Link&lt;/a&gt;
          &lt;/li&gt;
        &lt;/ul&gt;
      &lt;/li&gt;
      &lt;li class="nav-item"&gt;
        &lt;a class="nav-link" href="#!">Parent Link&lt;/a&gt;
      &lt;/li&gt;
    &lt;/ul&gt;</code>
  </pre>
</section>
